title: Wire --ui-ink flag to actually use React Ink UI

acceptanceCriteria.text: Find where _ralph_show_iteration_status is called in main loop
Add conditional: if use_ink_ui, call _ralph_show_ink_ui instead
Pass correct parameters (mode, prd_path, iteration, model, start_time)
Handle fallback gracefully if Ink UI fails
Test: ralph 5 --ui-ink shows Ink dashboard instead of shell UI
Test: ralph 5 (no flag) shows shell UI as before
